item.title: Create Content
item.description: Create chapter hugo new --kind chapter basics/_index.md New content insid main hugo new basics/first-content.md hugo new basics/second-content/_index.md Setup hugo on github main branch Go to the hubo site folder to create a sub module git submodule add -b main https://github.com/hexadoo/hexadoo.github.io.git public Create static files hugo -t hugo-theme-relearn

item.title: Start with Hugo
item.description: Start the hugo server hugo server Install hugo Download the binary unzip change the system environement variable: ![[Pasted image 20221010102257.png]] Add the hugo folder https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LIFvgrRxdt4 Create a new site hugo new site hexadoo Install themes Go to themes folder and clone the thems git clone https://github.com/McShelby/hugo-theme-relearn.git config themes Edit the config.toml file in terminal or with VSCode vi config.toml Edit with the following baseURL: = 'https://github.com/hexadoo/hexadoo.github.io' languageCode = "en-us" title = "Hexadoo Site" theme="hugo-theme-relearn" test site Run hugo server to test site locally
